description: Numbers that are the sum of 4 distinct nonzero squares in exactly 3 ways.
links: Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: With[{upto=950},Select[Union[Transpose[Select[Tally[Total/@ Subsets[ Range[ Ceiling[ Sqrt[upto-14]]]^2,{4}]],Last[#]==3&]][[1]]], #<=upto&]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 08 2011 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
